Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt your tablet each time you power it on

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded applications and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt your tablet, you must enter a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on: you can't unencrypt your tablet except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.
Encryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your tablet plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data."
Please charge your battery and try again.
Please plug in your charger and try again.
No lock screen PIN or password
You must set a lock screen PIN or password before you can start encryption.
Encrypt tablet? This operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the tablet will restart several times.
Please wait while your tablet is being encrypted. ^1% complete.

"Encryption was interrupted and can't complete. You must perform a factory data reset (erasing all your data) before you can resume using your tablet. You can try encrypting your tablet again after the reset is complete."

How to draw an unlock pattern

"Protect your tablet from unauthorized use by creating a personal screen unlock pattern. Use your finger to connect the dots in any order on the next screen. You must connect at least four dots.
Ready to start? Touch “Next”."
Manage applications, set up quick launch shortcuts

Your tablet and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by applications from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your tablet or loss of data that may result from using these applications.
You have selected to launch this application by default for some actions.
This application may not be designed for your screen; you can control how it adjusts to your screen here.
"All of this application's data will be deleted permanently. This includes all files, settings, accounts, databases and so on."
The application was not found in the list of installed applications.
Do you want to uninstall all updates to this Android system application?
This application can access the following on your tablet:
You do not have any third-party applications installed.
There is not enough storage left.
The specified install location is not valid.
System updates cannot be installed on external media.
Force stopping an application can cause it to misbehave. Are you sure?
Change the preferred installation location for new applications.
View and control currently running services
This service was started by its application. Stopping it may cause the application to fail.
This application can not safely be stopped. Doing so may lose some of your current work.
This is an old application process that is being kept for better speed in case it is needed again. There is usually no reason to stop it.
%1$s: currently in use. Touch Settings to control it.
Main process that is in use.
Are you sure you want to stop this system service? If you do, some features of your tablet may stop working correctly until you power it off and then on again.
Press Space key twice to insert \".\"
This input method may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the application %1$s. Use this input method?

Set keyboard shortcuts to launch applications
Your shortcut for %1$s (%2$s) will be cleared.
Debug mode when USB is connected
Screen will never sleep while charging

USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. It can be used to copy data between your computer and your device, install applications on your device without notification, and read log data.

This accessibility service may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data credit card numbers except passwords. It may also log your user interface interactions. It comes from the application %1$s. Use this accessibility service?

"You do not have any accessibility-related applications installed.
You can download a screen reader for your device from Android Market.
Click OK to install the screen reader."

Some applications can ask Google to download scripts to your tablet that make their content more accessible. Are you sure you want to allow Google to install accessibility scripts on your tablet?

Disabling background data extends battery life and lowers data use. Some applications may still use the background data connection.
Welcome to Google sync!" A Google approach to synchronizing data to allow access to your contacts, appointments, and more from wherever you are. "
"Do you really want to remove this account? Removing it will also delete all of its messages, contacts, and other data from the tablet. Proceed?"

This account is required by some applications. You can only remove it by resetting the tablet to factory defaults (which deletes all your personal data). You do that in the Settings application, under Privacy.
Sync for this item is currently disabled. To change your preference, temporarily turn on background data and automatic sync.
